website_summaries.verdict: A mid-level option that has a lot to offer and is great for target practice. However, you may want to purchase a better scope if you plan to take it hunting.
pros: Easy to assemble and smooth to shoot
Comes at a decent price point
Includes a quiver, two arrows, wax, cocking rope, and scope
cons: Scope isn't as well-made as the other components and is difficult to site

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box and put together, after about 6-8 shots had it set dead on!! 2” grouping at 50yds every time!!! If you are thinking about it, buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Noble

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very impressed with the quality at it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very impressed with the quality at it's price point! As with anyone who has experience with archery equipment it is very important to follow all instructions and wax the string regularly, which is some of the problems I've read between the lines on the negative reviews I've read below.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: buy one
customer_reviews.text: great crossbow,used a while and am totally impressed with the way it shoots and the accuracy. the scope is great,it only took 3 shots to zero it in. zero at 45 yards and shoots an easy 2 inch group. would recommend to anyone who is in the market for a cross bow.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Gingerich

customer_reviews.title: Good crossbow.  Stay tuned for post hunt updates.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second crossbow and I am really impressed. I have concerns about the scope based on other reviews but so far it has been pretty good. Top crosshair does out to 30 yards without much drop. I go to second crosshair for 35-40 yards. I won't shoot a deer past that.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice feel - good quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t go wrong with this crossbow. It has a nice feel - good quality. Easy to sight in, and it shoots nice! I’m super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Penguin

customer_reviews.title: not made in usa as advertised. made in china
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this crossbow because it was advertised on amazon site as made in USA. Crossbow came in and it is made in china .This is False advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Quality control questionable
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bow, but had problems. First one had considerable cam lean on the right side, to the point it looked as if the string was going to derail when it was cocked, and the string serving began to wear into in about 20 shots. It was waxed as per the manual. Sent that one back and got another. Second one was worse than first, same issue. Not buying a whitetail Hunter 2 a third time, they are 2 for 2 with issues.... Maybe lemons, maybe just this model, but not again for me!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and dont cheap out
customer_reviews.text: This crossbow is complete junk... shoots like crap and i have wounded 3 deer in the three weeks ive had it. Including a buck of a lifetime. At first I thought it was my broad heads then i shot 3 different kinds and they all went wacko. On the target i had okay groups. But every 4th shot went beserk.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Nakanishi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to sight in. Good crossbow for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bow based on reviews and it has lived up to its rating. After about 10 shots at the range I was getting just over 1" groups at 40 yds; Is the scope the best, no, but it is more than capable to go hunting with and good enough for this price point. Trigger is best I have ever shot on a crossbow, no creep and light. I wouldn't hesitate to buy crossbow again. Do check tightness on ALL bolts when assembling, I found a few that needed snugging up but no issues with that b/c you are responsible conducting final assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: This crossbow shoots as well as crossbows costing hundreds of dollars more. Out of the box the scope was close, but a few shots and clicks and it was on target. The owner’s manual was adequate but hardly in depth. The quiver has slots for three bolts but only two fit easily. Even with the so-so quiver and manual, I still give 5 stars because the crossbow is really great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second crossbow. My first one I bought local from a big box store named after a fish. It was pure junk and heavy. It literally blew up in my face. After only 6 shots sighting in the bow the string exploded. String was defective I don't know but I didn't want it, or another one from this store. Absolutely, no support from them but to their credit they didn't give me any hassle taking it back. I bought this one and never looked back! It's light and very powerful compared to others. Shipping was fast! Box arrived damaged but the bow was okay. Had a part missing I called Barnett and they sent it right out!
customer_reviews.author: Smart buys

customer_reviews.title: Crossbow is nice. Scope is junk.
customer_reviews.text: Update: anti-dry fire safety gets stuck frequently. Pain to fix. This is after I paid to upgrade the scope. Cross bow is nice. Scope is not. It did not matter how I adjusted the scope it would not sight in. Complete junk. I thought maybe I was flinching because it consistently shoots to the right and low no matter what shot after shot, but I got out our Excalibur and one shot it's good - sighted it in new myself no trouble 5 years ago. I will have to get a new sight. Adds cost and I was trying to save on money.
customer_reviews.author: Dian

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service and damaged bow
customer_reviews.text: So I received this as a gift a couple weeks but it was purchased back in August. I was out this weekend practicing and fine tuning. I came in and started waxing the strings and noticed that the right lower limb had a chip and small crack in it. I have sent Barnett 3 emails and have called a hand full of times with no luck or response what so ever. Very poor customer service. I havent even taken this on a hunt and cant do so because of the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Russell M.

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my purchase and Barnett’s customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase and Barnett’s customer service. The scope that came on the bow did have issues but customer service immediately resolved by sending me a replacement. I appreciate the anti dry fire set up. The bow is accurate and consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Good

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this crossbow and Barnett customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these crossbows, one last year and one in 2019. The one in 2019 the arrows would not sit flat in the barrel and it group at about 16 in at 30 yards and the handguard was broke. I tried to work this out with Barnett and it was a total nightmare working with their customer service and management. The only way I finally settled the issue was to post- videos on YouTube and contact the Better Business Bureau. So this review is for Barnett customer service and for the Whitetail Hunter 2. I would have avoided this bow!
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick E.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, hits hard
customer_reviews.text: This has been an accurate bow out to 50 yards, consistantly. We can hit at 60 but it isn't practical. I can't think of any downsides and at this price it was well worth it. Came with everything except an arrow puller which you will need. Also this bow hits hard, you will have to buy better targets because the arrows penetrate and ruin their fletchings. Loading may take a bit of strength but at this price you can buy the attachment
customer_reviews.author: phelps, krystal phelps

customer_reviews.title: Not very good build quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one and the arrows would not lay flat put a straight edge on it from the front the scope the rail goes down to the riser not straight like it should be. Which in turns causes inconsistent accuracy. Got a second one today for a replacement for the first one. It's worse than the first one. Both are made in China not in USA. Web page described them made In USA. I was warned about Barnett now I see why. Maybe the USA made crossbow s might be better. China ones aren't.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbitwv

customer_reviews.title: Missing correct quiver mount accessory
customer_reviews.text: It does not come with the correct amount that allows the quiver to be mounted as pictured and allowing it to be out of the way for handling/aiming/shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome cant wait to go hog hunting in the glades
customer_reviews.author: kayakpaul

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The optics are as durable as a house made of straw in a neighborhood full of wol.... you get it. This thing is fun for targets, if you are a real hunter please at least upgrade the sight out of respect for the animals you're hunting. It's an affordable piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: david sipes

customer_reviews.title: Light compact and fast
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this crossbow. Lite accurate and fast. Its compact so easy to transport. Other then that I don't have any cons yet. If I come across any I will edit my review
customer_reviews.author: Eli S

customer_reviews.title: Best value out there
customer_reviews.text: This isn't top of the line, but it's really hard to justify buying something like this with the price point. You get the most for your money out of this. The scope is nice, and the included bolts work great. The quiver could be improved
customer_reviews.author: KyleG

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal at 240
customer_reviews.text: The crossbow seems to be very good quality for someone like me that will only be using maybe once a year. scope works nice and being camo is great. I do think its lame to attach three bolt quiver and include only two bolts, why not a third to fill the quiver how it comes? Kinda goofy if you ask me
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and packs a punch, I'm impressed. Sighting the crossbow in was very easy. Straight out of the box, the scope only required a minor elevation adjustment. The bolts that come with the crossbow have poor vanes. The vanes actually separated from the bolt shaft after the first shot (the bolts penetrated the target past the vanes). So buy yourself some good crossbolts as well.
customer_reviews.author: NNulf

customer_reviews.title: Great crossbow at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this crossbow after some research, and am very pleased with it. The fit and finish are very impressive for the price. It is very light weight and compact, and the accessories seem to be good quality. I added the Barnett crank cocking device (part# 17455) and it fit well and works well on the Whitetail Hunter 2. The instructions for the crank cocking device were a little lacking, but after watching several videos of this product being installed on other Barnett models it wasn’t bad at all, so don’t be intimidated by some of the reviews on it.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Goltry

customer_reviews.title: String jumped the cam on first shot..
customer_reviews.text: String jumped the cam on the first shot! Box looked like it had been used before as well. (Tape over tape) Probably got a lemon on a countless return cycle. Had to cancel other orders as well, for extra bolts and broadheads. Got here quickly though! If only to disappoint me faster.. For $350 I'd rather buy a muzzle loader, or a pocket pistol.
customer_reviews.author: stu

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son so we can each hunt instead of me watching him hunt with my Parker. I'm super impressed! This thing comes with fatter arrows then the Parker and puts the Red Hots right through my target, and buries the Barnett bolts pretty deep too. I didn't know what I was going to do when my Parker finally craps out. I'll be buying a Barnett.
customer_reviews.author: RabidBeagle

customer_reviews.title: nice crossbow
customer_reviews.text: this is my first crossbow, can't wait to try it out, easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Rail blemished...
customer_reviews.text: The crossbow looked amazing, and shot great. I had no issues otherwise. Unfortunately the rail was blemished as if someone dripped acetone on it in many spots. Directly atop the rail, eating the finish and making a rough spot. It was a gift and they didn't mind, but it bothers me. :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing crossbow!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome crossbow! Its my first so I don't have much experience. But it's easy to assemble. Very easy to use. Safety features are excellent! Anti-dry fire and safety is wonderful! Very well constructed with quality materials. Made to last Fast, powerful and accurate. Even for an inexperienced person such as myself. Been target shooting with it for a few weeks. Not a single problem. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Good crossbow. Lightweight and accurate. Seems durable and well-made. Scope is good quality. I considered the whitetail pro model due to it having an aluminum rail, but didn't like the stirrup style, so I went with this one. Already killed a turkey with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter 63069

customer_reviews.title: Extremely accurate an incredibly powerful
customer_reviews.text: Extremely accurate an incredibly powerful if you get this crossbow, you will not be disappointed. It is extremely accurate and incredibly powerful. From 50 yards it will put a crossbow boat straight through both shoulders of a deer. The only improvement I would make is a larger quiver.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baudoin

customer_reviews.title: Good value but match it to your use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bow hunter and avid archer. Tore my bicep a few years ago and finally decided to try a crossbow. It's a lot different than a bow and it's not my 30-06, but it shoots well. I expected a bit more for range but at 35 - 40 yds drop isn't terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Rookie528

customer_reviews.title: Great crossbow with a major problem
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great accurate crossbow. That was until a hard misfire today. Hurt my hands as I had just cocked it. Hopefully I can get it warrantied quickly as I use it to hunt regularly.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, spot on at 20 yds with only 2 scope adjustments. Have not had the opportunity to check accuracy at 30 plus yards yet but expect it to be just fine. This came with the side mount quiver bracket instead of the front mount as I expected. The quiver rubber mounts for holding the bolts are way to stiff right now and make it harder to insert and remove the bolts from the quiver, not liking this so far...
customer_reviews.author: jimmattingly

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I love this cross bow. Very quite put it together once it arrived. I didn’t read the directions as if u know anything about crossbows it is very simple to put together. The scope was almost dead on. I have been shooting this at 40, 50 and 60 yards. It’s fast and very quite. I love it. It’s also very compact which is a plus in eastern NC woods
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M. Hecht

customer_reviews.title: Decent bow
customer_reviews.text: My first crossbow. Shoots well. Scope leaves something to be desired. I find it slowly must shift as I find myself having to make slight adjustments to the scope every couple days.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and not expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This bow is great. Already dropped a big 8 point. So glad I didn’t spend a shit ton on a big name brand xbow. Perfect for me cause Iam not shooting past 50 yards. Easy to sight in and packs a punch. So glad I went with this xbow. It did not disappoint one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Narley crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Love this bow, fast, easy to operate and fun to shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bow for a woman.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bow for myself because my husbands Barnett Ghost 400 was just too heavy and large for me to hunt with. This bow is awesome. It is small and light weight, but has a fast shooting speed of 350 fps, which is certainly fast enough to kill a deer. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a bow for themselves, male or female, young or old. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: extrafasst

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Target practice and everything was good to go. Scope was pretty accurate and no issues. However, I had the biggest buck of my life walk out in front of me this weekend...and the safety was jammed. I made sure the arrow was nocked and I used the rope handles to make sure I had pulled the string all the way back. Was unable to get the safety off and did not get a chance to shoot the buck that came into the field 2 different times on that hunt. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: chris benge

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great product right out of the box. Assembly was easy. Scope is not the greatest and will be replaced with an upgrade. Would suggest a cocking device install ($90). For the money I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MjE

customer_reviews.title: A phenomenal piece of equipment great for hunting idiot proof
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely phenomenal unbelievable great for beginners and disabled people. with a good rage or hypodermic 20in it is lethal and ethical at 25 m all day with minimal practice.
customer_reviews.author: simeon hill

customer_reviews.title: warm and fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: gives you a warm and fuzzy feeling when it goes thunk and a bolt 50 yds out knocks over your target and then your sad because you have to go set it back up
customer_reviews.author: stuff

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bow!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first crossbow. Im 31 and love it. I have killed 3 deer this season all at 55 yards using a rage 3blade and all 3 deer didn't go more than 25 yards. I did not have to track a single one. Best bang for your buck. 6 shots to zero in the scope. I love this bow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i need the scope replaced the cross hares in mine are frayed
customer_reviews.text: hunting, and i need the scope replaced the cross hares are frayed on the inside of the scope and the eye piece pops out and won't screw back on...please replace
customer_reviews.author: mary e cannon

customer_reviews.title: Quality and accuracy is phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: This crossbow is amazing for the price and quality. I’m running 125 grain rage mechanical hypodermics and 415 grain headhunters. Heavy combo that’s still pushing 315 FPS. Tight groups every time, smooth trigger, and fun to shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Scotchnguns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Barnett crossbow
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Barnett Whitetail II. I have bought many accessories for it. It's very accurate and fast enough for me right now. I would recommend this cross bow to anyone with a passion for hunting with crossbows.
customer_reviews.author: CNCMillMann

customer_reviews.title: First hunt, first kill
customer_reviews.text: We bought thisd for our son. The first trip he came up to hunt with me, he had a shot at a great buck and wacked him dead to rights at 50 yards. Dead on, literally.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Johns

customer_reviews.title: Performs better than my more expensive bows.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bow for several months now. It actually performs better than a couple of my more expensive bows. I added a crank before going hunting it definitely made it easier for me to bring down my game.
customer_reviews.author: Gale w Myers

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to contact company.
customer_reviews.text: It might be decent, however I have 2 small questions and have waited over 20 hours and still have not talked to anyone. The crossbows' comes with a giant red warning page to call if you have ANY questions. It is impossible to contact them. Any phone batteries will go dead before they answer. I am glad that I do not a a larger problem. Would nervier buy again. Would buy a good model from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Schefer

customer_reviews.title: Nice crossbow but Scope was broken out of box
customer_reviews.text: Crossbow is very nice,pretty lightweight and All easy to work and assemble. Only problem I had was the scope was broken out of the box. Wouldnt adjust left to right only up and down. Spoke to amazon and they made it right and fixed the issue so they are great. So far no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Picked one up on sale for $260... would be worth buying at DOUBLE that cost! Took about 10 minutes to assemble, 5 minutes to site in, and we are putting arrows in deer. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to sight in and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Photos in booklet for assembly were useless; couldn’t see what instructions said. Fortunately, some of the crossbow was already assembled and the rest was able to be figured out. Scope was mounted but slightly off vertical and had to be reset. Holders for arrows in quiver were very tight; ground them down for easier fit. Regardless, easy to sight in and crossbow is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding crossbow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and easy bow to assemble right outta the box. I was hitting targets at over 40 yards.i believe it will harvest a deer at 50 plus yards.i have a 3d target at 40 yards bolt went in about 7 inches. Will update
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Rope on cocking device was too short. Called for a replacement or advice on replacement rope specifications, and I could not get through. I tried twice, on hold forever then left a message and no one got back to me. It may be a good crossbow, but customer service is nonexistant. Also, the owners manual is possibly the worst manual I have ever read, almost useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to sight in only took 4 shots. This crossnow is very strong. I would not recommend children or novice hunters start with a bow this strong. Just a great product easy to cock and fire. Very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Andy McLean

customer_reviews.title: Quiver Mount is trash
customer_reviews.text: The bow itself is sturdy and well built for the price but depending on what mount they give you for the quiver will make or break the product. A friend of mine ordered the exact same bow and his quiver Mount is solid and is easy to use. Mine however is complete garbage and the quiver isn’t sturdy and makes tons of noise because how much it rattles around.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph f.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bow is sick, easy to pull back and pretty accurate with the stock scope. I would recommend it to anyone hunting with a crossbow.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hunt

customer_reviews.title: fabulous and wicked accurate
customer_reviews.text: this x bow is ridiculously accurate. I was shooting around 50 yds with no issues in the bullseye and I am not particularly good at shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy L Lang

customer_reviews.title: Whitetail Hunter II
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Whitetail Hunter II. Works great / very accurate. No problems sighted in 3 shoots.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Great product with outstanding Customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: To the makers that is product you guys are 2nd to none. As for customer OMG I can't say enough about the positive experience I had with their customer service/satisfaction team. They were AWESOME!!!! I wish there were more stars to add. You guys are AAA++!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good budget xbow
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale for $250, a great value for a decent crossbow with scope. Shot 1 inch pattern at 40 yards straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Audun J Hoen

customer_reviews.title: Good bow
customer_reviews.text: Had zero problems sighting in scope the scope seems good shot out to 40 yards no problem holds nice groups only wish I would have got the quiver that crosses the bow instead of along side it bow was pictured with the across one
customer_reviews.author: Stacey m.

customer_reviews.title: good crossbow bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Crossbow was easy to put together. good overall bow. But recieved the scope with a crack in lens. Had to replace with a new scope. Didn't bother to contact manufacturer because didn't want to go through that drama to get a new scope
customer_reviews.author: Captain Hans Roeming

customer_reviews.title: Great crossbow
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my father in law and he loves it. We have shot it a bunch of times with no issues. Next thing we will be doing is taking down some deer.
customer_reviews.author: Offer House

customer_reviews.title: Barnett Won’t Reply
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an Xmas gift for my husband, he loves it. He assembled it, and noticed the quiver bracket only has the quiver going parallel to the rack. It doesn’t fit right. He emailed Barnett twice and called once, to inquire about the quiver, And hasn’t heard back. The quiver will not be functional as it is today, he believes he got the wrong bracket but has no way of knowing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More like a toy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with missing parts so I sent it back. It was very lightweight plastic and cheaply put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Good bow but the quiver is weak
customer_reviews.text: Light, compact and accurate so far. However the mount on the quiver broke and now I have to carry my quiver in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Jenne Jr

customer_reviews.title: Decent bow, scope and butt stock adjustment could improve.
customer_reviews.text: Decent crossbow for the price. Had to extend the scope as far forward as possible and still need to rest my check close to butt stock to get clear sight picture. The butt stock adjustment is minimal and would love to have another few inches of adjustment to help correct for the scope sight picture and provide more natural shooting position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One awesome crossbow.
customer_reviews.text: One bad a** Crossbow.. Very well made and, scope is zeroed in already.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Michael Edward Shuck

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son in law and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: 100 percent would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy was extremely easy to assemble, shoots with incredible accuracy and comes with a rope cocking device, bow wax, two arrows that fly true and a small mounted quiver. The scope that comes with the bow is decent, but I upgraded to a red/green dot variant. It's an incredible value, and I'm very much looking forward to the next hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: larry banks

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied so far. Took a while to get it sighted in but hitting bullseyes now.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Grant

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Only need needed 2 adjustments to sight in at 20 yards. Scope was only off 2” high and 2” right, right out of the box. Fast, quiet for crossbow standards, light weight and well built. Would recommend and buy again
customer_reviews.author: Todd Larson

customer_reviews.title: Nice crossbow! Sighting in the scope took major adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Nice crossbow! Sighting in the scope took major adjustments!! 100 + clicks up & 100 + clicks to left. Dead center bull's eye.20-top line/40-2nd line.
customer_reviews.author: Quenten Scannell

customer_reviews.title: What a value
customer_reviews.text: Got this on some flash sale and for what I paid it kills!
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great price easy assembly and great to shoot
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and sited right in at 30 yards great price good crossbow
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a nail driver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for her first crossbow. She has no problem cocking it manually. I have also taken it out hunting myself, it is extremely accurate with rage hypodermic blades.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: accurate and great for the money
customer_reviews.text: does not get easier than this, ready to shoot setup. easy setup and came sighted! was hitting bullsye out of the box. for the money this is a bestbuy, barnett is a reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Great bow
customer_reviews.text: My first crossbow and man am I blown away. It took 30 minutes to sight this thing in at 60 yards! I’m confident at 40-60 yards easy
customer_reviews.author: Deven S.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I liked every feature except I could not extend the stock long enough for my arm reach. I plan to use this for deer hunting
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice bow
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, wish had better instructions for the scope. Rope cock works great
customer_reviews.author: Philip U.

customer_reviews.title: is there a warranty on catastrophic srting malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is that the string popped off or broke after less than 10 shots now have to pay 150 to restring and fix
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Husband is a huge hunter he loves it has several other but he loves this one
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Xbow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for deer season and am pleased with it. Haven't hunted with it yet, and the wife decided she wanted it. So now I'm shooting a KI Ripper 415.
customer_reviews.author: JRush69

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Right Out Of The Box
customer_reviews.text: This is my first crossbow. I am impressed by the accuracy. I can't wait to try it out on a Whitetail this Archery season!
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this lightweight bow
customer_reviews.text: Has really gotten good results with the accuracy of this bow. Easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: jjl

customer_reviews.title: Great Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Easy to sight and shoot, hit bulls eye at 50 yds first shot. Great entry level crossbow!!
customer_reviews.author: Sixx

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bow
customer_reviews.text: Zeroed in quickly and ready for hunting 20 min after opening the box
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cross bow
customer_reviews.text: Nice cross bow scope clear Small in size easy to reload and accurate
customer_reviews.author: William J Kovalcik

customer_reviews.title: He likes it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my significant other for Christmas and he really likes it! It was easy to site in and is dead on!
customer_reviews.author: dawn raymond

customer_reviews.title: Manual is not very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Just got this crossbow two weeks ago and put it together it was easy to do. This is my first crossbow it is light weight and seems very stout. I haven't shot it yet but will up date when I do.
customer_reviews.author: james williams

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Dead on at 50 yrds out the box super easy assembly
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son but this is a very nice crossbow.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Great bow!
customer_reviews.text: Great bow for the money!!! Highly recommend. Haven't had a single problem with it!
customer_reviews.author: cara briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Great Crossbow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it! It took just a couple shots to site it in and the scope is great. He's been shooting at 70 yards and it's very accurate. I would definitely recommend this crossbow.
customer_reviews.author: Sessaly

customer_reviews.title: Deadly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and use. Very accurate out of the box. A few clicks on the scope and it shoots an inch pattern at 50 yds. all day long. Great crossbow for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice crossbow.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome crossbow. Not a major fan of the safety lever.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Melenich

product_meta.title: Barnett Whitetail Hunter II Crossbow
feature_bullets: 350 feet per second. Draw weight: 150 pounds; Kinetic energy: 103 feet pounds. Real tree extra camo
Overall weight 6.4 pounds| axle to axle 16.125" | dimensions 34.25"L x 18.25"W
Made in the USA and ships mostly assembled; 12.5 Power Stroke (in)
Trigger tech technology with 3 pounds zero-creep release. All stainless steel components. Nock sensor and adf eliminate dry fires
Includes: 4x32 scope, rope cocking device, light weight quiver, two 20 inch Headhunter arrows, lube wax (we suggest you lube strings every 10 shots)
